page.title: 15RECREATION IN BETHERSDEN(2)
page.content: THE WIVES CLUB,OVER 60s AND W.I.MEET MONTHLY AND HAVE A SPEAKER TO ENTERTAIN MEMBERS. THE W.I. ARE VERY ACTIVE.THEY HAVE TWO DARTS TEAMS AND A HANDICRAFT GROUP CURRENTLY MAKING ITEMS FOR MOTHER THERESA IN INDIA;ALSO A CROCHET CLASS AND DRAMA GROUP WHICH PRESENTS A PANTOMIME AT CHRISTMAS. THE PROCEEDS FROM THIS ARE DONATED TO A LOCAL CHARITY.THE GARDENER'S SOCIETY CELEBRATES IT'S CENTENARY IN 1986 AND HOLDS AN AUTUMN AND SUMMER SHOW EVERY YEAR.THE FOOTBALL CLUB WERE RUNNERS-UP IN THE ASHFORD AND DISTRICT LEAGUE DIVISION III CUP AND PLACED THIRD IN THE LEAGUE.THE CRICKET CLUB IS IN THE KENT VILLAGE LEAGUE AND WERE PROMOTED TO DIVISION I FOR 1985.THE TENNIS CLUB HAS TWO TEAMS IN THE ASHFORD LEAGUE. WHIST DRIVES,JUMBLE SALES,BOOT FAIRS AND DANCES ARE HELD TO RAISE FUNDS.
